questionTitle: Who are all ________ people?
I don't know ________ people.
We live near ________ the river.
He says that he must have ________.
John is a good worker: he works very ________.
Let's ________ a party!
The radio's much too loud: please turn it ________.
Would you like some sugar? - Yes, please, just ________.
They say he has ________ money.
How much time do you ________ your homework?
My father is ________ man.
Millions of cigarettes ________ every year.
Gold, as well as silver ________ in price, he said.
They quarrelled ________ the choice of a house.
Fred was a really silly boy when we were in high-school. I still remember ________ very stupid questions.
________ I like the Rolling Stones.
Are you sorry that you didn't take pictures? - Yes, I regret ________ any.
If he had not given me advice, I ________ again.
What ________ ! The rain has not stopped all day.
Which of the two boys is a boy scout? - ________ of them is.
